Title: Agent Skills in VS Code
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
Agent Skills introduce a new way to customize AI agents in VS Code without overwhelming the context window.

In this video, Harald walks through what Agent Skills are, where they live in VS Code, and how to enable and structure them using simple Markdown files. You‚Äôll see how skills complement custom instructions and help agents load the right knowledge at the right time.
